boardgame.name: Compatibility
天生絕配
boardgame.description: Play is in teams of two. Each person has a deck of picture cards. Each deck has the same set of pictures. There is also a deck of word cards with words like _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;marriage_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;de facto_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;pimple_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A word is chosen and each player chooses 2-5 cards from his/her deck. Teams score points for choosing the same pictures, and score extra points for putting the pictures in the same order (from most to least important)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The board is used to keep track of the score, and to dictate how many pictures a team may select. First team to the end wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Re-implemented by:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Compatibility 15th Anniversary Edition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2011 Årets Spill Best Party Game Nominee

listing.notes: Mattel 1996 edition, complete. One deck of topic cards are still sealed. Box top is scratched. I will add actual USPS priority mail shipping cost. I cannot accept credit cards through PayPal.

Older Mattel version that handles six players. A couple of the decks look like they were never used; for the remainder of the decks, a few cards in each deck look handled and they are bowed compared to the rest of the cards, but this probably wouldn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t be a big deal during play. All decks are complete and all topic cards and tokens are included. The box is somewhat banged up, but the board is untouched and lies flat. Please write for shipping costs for a small box by your preferred shipping method to wherever you live. Or write for more details about the condition of cards if you want more details.
